meanings.definition: A person who buys goods or services.
meanings.sent1: The costumer purchased a new dress for the party.
meanings.sent2: The costumer visited the store to buy some groceries.
meanings.sent3: The costumer couldn't resist the temptation of getting the latest gadget.
meanings.sent4: She was a costumer of happiness, always seeking joy in little things.
meanings.sent5: The costumer's shopping habits were known throughout the town.

meanings.definition: A person who designs or makes costumes.
meanings.sent1: The costumer created stunning outfits for the theater production.
meanings.sent2: As a costumer, she was known for her attention to detail in costume design.
meanings.sent3: The costumer's sewing machine was her best friend during costume-making.
meanings.sent4: In her hands, fabric turned into magic; she was a true costumer.
meanings.sent5: The costumer's creativity knew no bounds when it came to costume design.

meanings.definition: A person who rents or sells costumes.
meanings.sent1: The costumer provided a wide range of costumes for the school play.
meanings.sent2: Renting from the costumer was always a hassle-free experience.
meanings.sent3: The costumer's shop was a treasure trove of costume options.
meanings.sent4: She was a costumer by day, transforming people into characters by night.
meanings.sent5: The costumer's collection of costumes was the talk of the town.
